channel.title: Mass? and xp change
channel.description: how do i make it so when people click a dummy or something to train on to fast they get kicked and how do i change the xp for things to train on?

item.title: Mass? and xp change
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“xdarklight.x, post:5, topic:153475”][quote author=Anti Pizza link=topic=209793.msg1838023#msg1838023 date=1193022661]
Here is a example

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“sbfast”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Lord Golds Throneroom”))
[/quote]

how dose this relate to what im talkign about[/quote]

It doesn’t, your right. Maybe something to record the clicks? Or maybe a boolean, to state, if you click over that amount, it automatically DC’s yu?

Read full topic
